channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: This patient’s Neuralink brain implant gets a boost from generative AI
item.description: Last November, Bradford G. Smith got a brain implant from Elon Musk’s company Neuralink. The device, a set of thin wires attached to a computer about ...

item.title: Lightricks just made AI video generation 30x faster — and you won’t need a $10,000 GPU
item.description: Lightricks unveils groundbreaking LTXV-13B AI video model that runs 30X faster than competitors on consumer hardware through innovative "multiscale re...

item.title: AWS report: Generative AI overtakes security in global tech budgets for 2025
item.description: New AWS report reveals 45% of global IT leaders now prioritize generative AI over cybersecurity in 2025 tech budgets as companies race to hire AI tale...

item.title: ServiceNow lets users see more of their AI
item.description: ServiceNow also announced a way for agents to communicate with others along with its new observability platform.

item.title: Teradyne Robotics makes leadership changes at MiR, UR
item.description: Jean-Pierre Hathout transitions from MiR to UR replacing Kim Povlsen. Kevin Dumas is promoted to the helm of MiR. The post Teradyne Robotics makes lea...

item.title: Meet the new king of AI coding: Google’s Gemini 2.5 Pro I/O Edition dethrones Claude 3.7 Sonnet
item.description: One of the standout features of the update is its ability to build full, interactive web apps or simulations from a single prompt.

item.title: Recapping Robotics Summit & Expo 2025
item.description: We recap the Robotics Summit & Expo 2025 with a live feed from the show floor in Boston. The post Recapping Robotics Summit & Expo 2025 appeared first...
